name: Upjohn Company, Appellant, v. Chester Discount Health and Vitamin Center, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Upjohn Co. v. Chester Discount Health & Vitamin Center, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Bbien, JJ.
parties: Upjohn Company, Appellant, v. Chester Discount Health and Vitamin Center, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Appeals dismissed for lack of compliance with Rules of Court. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James F. McMullan, Francis J. Mirante, and Clark, Ladner, Fortenbaugh & Young, and Hinkson & Cantlin, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Upjohn Company, Appellant, v. Chester Discount Health and Vitamin Center, Inc.
Submitted May 24, 1962.
September 25, 1962:
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Bbien, JJ.
James F. McMullan, Francis J. Mirante, and Clark, Ladner, Fortenbaugh & Young, and Hinkson & Cantlin, for appellant.
Samuel M. Totten, for appellees.
